function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"COVID-19 diffusion influenced by population and settlement characteristics, with HDI as a strong predictor.","Impact":"Potential for hierarchical diffusion from more developed countries to less developed countries.","Mitigation":"Implement measures to control the spread of COVID-19 in both developed and developing countries.","Technologies":"Advanced monitoring and tracking systems for COVID-19 transmission.","People":"Populations in both developed and developing countries.","Owner":"Government authorities and healthcare organizations."},{"Description":"Impact of settlement characteristics on COVID-19 diffusion, with a focus on mobility.","Impact":"Higher levels of mobility in more-developed countries contributing to diffusion.","Mitigation":"Implement strict mobility controls and monitoring of international and internal movements.","Technologies":"Advanced mobility tracking and surveillance systems.","People":"Residents and travelers in more-developed countries.","Owner":"Government authorities and transportation agencies."}]}
